summary: Completed testing of recursive folders (Gallery/Library), view counts, search in descriptions, config endpoint, and folder path APIs. All features working correctly.

issues: Console warning: Duplicate extension names found: ['link', 'underline'] - minor TipTap configuration issue

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/config returns app_name and email_configured status
Backend: Gallery folder creation with parent_id (recursive folders)
Backend: Gallery subfolder creation inside parent folder
Backend: GET /api/projects/{id}/gallery/folders/{folderId}/path returns breadcrumb path
Backend: Gallery listing filtered by folder_id shows subfolders
Backend: Library folder creation with parent_id (recursive folders)
Backend: Library subfolder creation inside parent folder
Backend: GET /api/projects/{id}/library/folders/{folderId}/path returns breadcrumb path
Backend: Blog entries have views field (initial value 0)
Backend: Library entries have views field (initial value 0)
Backend: Blog list includes views for all entries
Backend: Library list includes views for all entries
Backend: Blog search finds entries by description content
Backend: Library search finds entries by description content
Backend: Diary search finds entries by story content
Frontend: Gallery page loads with breadcrumb navigation
Frontend: Gallery Root breadcrumb button works
Frontend: Gallery folder creation dialog works
Frontend: Gallery subfolder creation inside parent folder works
Frontend: Gallery breadcrumb shows full path (Root > Parent > Child)
Frontend: Gallery 'Go back' (..) folder navigation works
Frontend: Library page loads with breadcrumb navigation
Frontend: Library folder creation works
Frontend: Library subfolder creation works
Frontend: Library breadcrumb shows folder path
Frontend: Library entry creation works
Frontend: Blog page shows view counts with Eye icon (0 views)
Frontend: Blog search finds entries by description content
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: TipTap RichTextEditor has duplicate extension warning for 'link' and 'underline' - should deduplicate extensions in configuration
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_ prefixed folders and entries for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working: 1) Gallery recursive folders with breadcrumb navigation (Root > Parent > Child), 2) Library recursive folders with breadcrumb navigation, 3) View counts displayed on Blog entries (Eye icon with X views), 4) Library view counts show when views > 0, 5) Search in Blog/Library/Diary includes description/story content, 6) GET /api/config returns app_name and email_configured status, 7) Folder path APIs return correct breadcrumb paths. SMTP email is configured but not actually sending (SMTP_HOST not set in env) - this is expected development behavior.
